name: Outbreak (itch) (ScholarZero)
description:
Can you clear the infection?  Blow up people carrying the disease before they can infect anyone else!!

WASD to move player

Spacebar scans the area in front of the player

Mouse Click to nuke a target zone

If any infection is detected in the scanned zone, all people in the zone become suspect!  But that doesn't mean they're carrying the disease.
